00026  * Notes:
00027  *
00028  * A plugin to read targa (TGA) image files into an OpenGL-compatible RGBA
00029  * format, simple demonstration program.
00030  *

00033 
00034 // preprocessor directives
00035 
00036 #include <stdio.h>
00037 #include "targa.h"
00038 
00039 
00040 // define constants
00041 
00042 #define TARGA_RLE_FILENAME                  "assets/asdftargaTest.RLE.tga"
00043 
00044 #define TARGA_NON_RLE_FILENAME              "assets/targaTest.NON-RLE.tga"
00045 
00046 
00047 // main function
00048 
00049 int main(int argc, char *argv[])
00050 {
00051     Targa targa;
00052 
00053     printf("Simple TARGA library demonstration application.\n");
00054     printf("Copyright (C) 2006 - 2009 by Joshua S. English.\n");
00055     printf("Written by Joshua S. English.\n\n");
00056 
00057     // an RLE TARGA File example
00058 
00059     // initialize the struct
00060 
00061     if(targa_init(&targa) < 0) {
00062         return 1;
00063     }
00064 
00065     // load the TARGA from a file
00066 
00067     if(targa_loadFromFile(&targa, TARGA_RLE_FILENAME) < 0) {
00068         return 1;
00069     }
00070 
00071     printf("Loaded '%s', image length: %i, (%i x %i) pixels\n",
00072             TARGA_RLE_FILENAME, targa.imageLength, targa.width, targa.height);
00073 
00074     // apply a red-channel mask of 255
00075 
00076     if(targa_applyRgbaMask(&targa, TARGA_COLOR_RED, 255) < 0) {
00077         return 1;
00078     }
00079 
00080     // replace the blue-channel with color 127
00081 
00082     if(targa_applyRgbaMask(&targa, TARGA_COLOR_BLUE, 127) < 0) {
00083         return 1;
00084     }
00085 
00086     // free the struct
00087 
00088     if(targa_free(&targa) < 0) {
00089         return 1;
00090     }
00091 
00092 
00093     // an non-RLE TARGA File example
00094 
00095     // initialize the struct
00096 
00097     if(targa_init(&targa) < 0) {
00098         return 1;
00099     }
00100 
00101     // load the TARGA from a file
00102 
00103     if(targa_loadFromFile(&targa, TARGA_NON_RLE_FILENAME) < 0) {
00104         return 1;
00105     }
00106 
00107     printf("Loaded '%s', image length: %i, (%i x %i) pixels\n",
00108             TARGA_NON_RLE_FILENAME, targa.imageLength, targa.width,
00109             targa.height);
00110 
00111     // apply a red-channel mask of 255
00112 
00113     if(targa_applyRgbaMask(&targa, TARGA_COLOR_RED, 255) < 0) {
00114         return 1;
00115     }
00116 
00117     // replace the blue-channel with color 127
00118 
00119     if(targa_applyRgbaMask(&targa, TARGA_COLOR_BLUE, 127) < 0) {
00120         return 1;
00121     }
00122 
00123     // free the struct
00124 
00125     if(targa_free(&targa) < 0) {
00126         return 1;
00127     }
00128 
00129 
00130     // exit program
00131 
00132     return 0;
00133 }
